name: Hypermarket Tycoon Manager
description:
Hypermarket Tycoon Manager is an engaging business simulation game where you take on the role of a young entrepreneur who aims to build and grow a successful supermarket business.

You start with a small store and a limited budget, but with your hard work and determination, you can turn your store into a thriving hypermarket that attracts customers from all over the city. Your primary objective is to manage your store effectively and grow your business by making strategic decisions.

As you progress, you can unlock new features such as additional parking spaces, more checkout counters, and more extensive product categories, which will enable you to attract more customers and generate higher profits.
With Hypermarket Tycoon Manager, you can experience the thrill of running a successful business & the satisfaction of making profitable decisions.
Become the most popular and successful hypermarket in the city and attract all the inhabitants to come to buy only from you!

Game Features :
- Upgrades and expansion ( Parking spaces, more employees and more other)
- Financial management
- User-friendly Interface
